text: The Wigan Warriors Women are an English professional women's rugby league team based in Wigan, Greater Manchester. They were formed in 2018 and played during the second season of the Women's Super League in 2018 and won the title beating Leeds Rhinos Women in 18-16 in the Grand Final at the Manchester Regional Arena.https://www.rugby-league.com/article/53756/wigan-warriors- crowned-womens-super-league-champions ==Honours== ===Leagues=== *Women's Super League ::Winners (1): 2018 ==2019 squad== Wigan Warriors Women ==References== Category:Wigan Warriors Category:2018 establishments in England Category:Rugby clubs established in 2018 Category:Sport in Wigan Category:Women's rugby league teams in England Category:Rugby league teams in Greater Manchester Category:RFL Women's Super League
title: Wigan Warriors Women
